A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The 54% and falling audience score is justified.  Don't see this movie.  Disney royally s**t the bed with Last Jedi.  Plot holes\, no sense logic\, insulting to previous Star Wars lore built up so far\, and Star Wars Episode 7 may as well not have happened.
